content: add some charm to your home with this cottage inspired crochet chunky pillow * pattern is written in standard us terms * basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern * guided video tutorial materials needed -super bulky #6 yarn -size 10 0 mm crochet hook -20″ inch x 20″ inch 50 x 50 cm zipper pillow cover -4 pom-poms -stitch markers -darning needle -needle + thread -scissors
